chatbot.title: AI Health Assistant
chatbot.subtitle: Your personal health companion
chatbot.placeholder: Ask me anything about your health...
chatbot.welcome: Hello! I'm your AI health assistant. I can help you with health information, appointment booking, and general wellness guidance.

responses.appointment: I can help you book an appointment! Please visit the appointments section or tell me your preferred date and time.
responses.symptoms: I'm not a doctor, but I can help you find information about common symptoms. Please describe your symptoms and I'll provide general guidance. For medical emergencies, please contact emergency services immediately.
responses.health: Maintaining good health involves regular exercise, balanced diet, adequate sleep, and regular medical check-ups. Would you like specific advice on any health topic?
responses.medicine: Please consult with a healthcare professional before taking any medication. I can help you find general information about common medications, but always follow your doctor's advice.
responses.emergency: For medical emergencies, please call emergency services immediately (102 for medical emergencies in India). If you need urgent medical attention, go to the nearest hospital.
responses.thanks: You're welcome! Is there anything else I can help you with regarding your health?
responses.default: I understand you're asking about health matters. I'm here to help with general health information and guidance. For specific medical advice, please consult with a healthcare professional.
